attributes.action: Stop the cruel Halal Slaughter of animals
attributes.additional_details:
Just watch this video http://www.liveleak.com/view?i=545_1345800806 if you can!

After you have watched, sign this petition and tweet it, Facebook it and ask all your friends to do the same.

Like you, I have read the untrue stories that say that Halal slaughter is quick and painless for animals, now you know that it TOTALLY UNTRUE
